function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased number of tweets about neighbour noise due to lockdown","Impact":"Higher risk of neighbour noise propagation and annoyance, potentially leading to decreased well-being","Mitigation":"Implement soundproofing measures, establish community noise guidelines, and facilitate communication to address noise concerns","Technologies":"Soundproof materials, noise monitoring devices, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents, workers, and local authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Decrease in perceived outdoor noise level and increase in perceived neighbour noise level during the lockdown","Impact":"Potential increase in annoyance and discomfort due to higher perceived neighbour noise levels","Mitigation":"Enhance sound insulation for buildings, regulate noise levels for communal areas, and promote dialogue and awareness about neighbour noise","Technologies":"Sound insulation materials, noise mapping tools, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents, local authorities, and building managers","Owner":"Local authorities, building owners, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Respondents more annoyed by neighbour noise than outdoor noise during the lockdown","Impact":"Increased dissatisfaction and decreased well-being due to higher annoyance levels from neighbour noise","Mitigation":"Implement noise reduction measures, promote respectful noise behavior, and cultivate a culture of noise awareness and consideration","Technologies":"Noise cancelling devices, community engagement platforms, and public awareness campaigns","People":"Residents, workers, and local authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, building managers, and community organizations"}]}
